Text: European Trading MeetingJeff I just wanted to check whether the Trading Meeting was actually taking place today Justin wondered whether it would be cancelled as you have the AllEmployee Meeting Hope you are well Kind regards Nicola

RE European Trading MeetingNo problem Thanks Jeff Nicola Original Message From Hodge Jeffrey T Sent October To Beales Nicola Cc Taylor Mark E Legal Rosell Martin Subject RE European Trading Meeting Nicola In followup to our telephone conversation todays meeting is cancelled Could you advise everyone at your end The next meeting will be weeks from today Thanks Jeff Original Message From Beales Nicola Sent Tuesday October AM To Hodge Jeffrey T Subject European Trading Meeting Jeff I just wanted to check whether the Trading Meeting was actually taking place today Justin wondered whether it would be cancelled as you have the AllEmployee Meeting Hope you are well Kind regards Nicola

UK Online Documents Cc As requested please find attached copies of each of the UK ETA and the UK PA Kind regards Nicola Forwarded by Nicola BealesLONECT on Justin Boyd To Nicola CT cc Subject UK Online Documents Nic If you could deal with this thanks J Forwarded by Justin BoydLONECT on From Tana Jones on CST To Justin CT cc Subject UK Online Documents Justy We are going to be trading with Deutsche Bank out of their New York and London branch offices online Per my conv wthe online team we going to have to have them come in thru both Houston and London as a counterparty we havent solved multibranch customers online With Edmund out I need someone to email me your Electronic Trading Agreement and Password Application so we can send them to the lawyer we are negotiating the ISDA Master with Can you have someone there send me the docs Much thanks

Re EnronOnline Cc to your email to Ed I am actually updating Profile Manager for Justin as much as I can on a daily basis Kind regards Nicola Edmund Cooper To Nicola CT cc Subject EnronOnline Can you answer this Forwarded by Edmund CooperLONECT on PM From Tana Jones on AM CST To Edmund CT cc Subject EnronOnline Do you know who in London is actually updating Legals comments to Profile Manager I cant believe Justin does this everyday

Re EnronOnline Cc to your email to Ed I am actually updating Profile Manager for Justin as much as I can on a daily basis Kind regards Nicola Edmund Cooper To Nicola CT cc Subject EnronOnline Can you answer this Forwarded by Edmund CooperLONECT on PM From Tana Jones on AM CST To Edmund CT cc Subject EnronOnline Do you know who in London is actually updating Legals comments to Profile Manager I cant believe Justin does this everyday

UK Online Documents Cc As requested please find attached copies of each of the UK ETA and the UK PA Kind regards Nicola Forwarded by Nicola BealesLONECT on Justin Boyd To Nicola CT cc Subject UK Online Documents Nic If you could deal with this thanks J Forwarded by Justin BoydLONECT on From Tana Jones on CST To Justin CT cc Subject UK Online Documents Justy We are going to be trading with Deutsche Bank out of their New York and London branch offices online Per my conv wthe online team we going to have to have them come in thru both Houston and London as a counterparty we havent solved multibranch customers online With Edmund out I need someone to email me your Electronic Trading Agreement and Password Application so we can send them to the lawyer we are negotiating the ISDA Master with Can you have someone there send me the docs Much thanks

Re Equity Trading in the UK Cc getting back to me I will ask Justin to initiate the call Kind regards Nicola From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Nicola CT cc Subject Re Equity Trading in the UK The time works fine Will Justin initiate the call Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Nicola Beales AM To Sara CT cc Ian nron Justin CT Subject Equity Trading in the UK Sara Further to your email to Justin re equity trading in the UK I would be grateful if you could let me know whether you would be free to have a conference call this Friday March pm London time If this is not convenient please suggest an alternative time I look forward to hearing from you Kind regards Nicola

Re Equity Trading in the UK Cc getting back to me I will ask Justin to initiate the call Kind regards Nicola From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Nicola CT cc Subject Re Equity Trading in the UK The time works fine Will Justin initiate the call Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Nicola Beales AM To Sara CT cc Ian nron Justin CT Subject Equity Trading in the UK Sara Further to your email to Justin re equity trading in the UK I would be grateful if you could let me know whether you would be free to have a conference call this Friday March pm London time If this is not convenient please suggest an alternative time I look forward to hearing from you Kind regards Nicola

Bullion Due Diligence Cc Mark David and Peter We have been asked to carry out due diligence so that we can trade Bullion on EnronOnline and have instructed local counsel with respect to the list of European jurisdictions I have been given The products involved so far are Gold Silver Platinum and Palladium The other jurisdictions that would fall under your remit are as follows Mark USA Peru Mexico David Australia Peter Canada Kind regards Justin Boyd
